Dashboard page!!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
```


```{r}
noaa_df =
  ny_noaa %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 100000) %>% 
 separate(date, c("year","month","day")) %>% 
  mutate(
    year = as.factor(year),
    month = as.factor(month),
    day = as.factor(day),
    tmax = as.integer(tmax),
    tmin = as.integer(tmin)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    prcp = round(prcp * .03937 / 10),
    tmax = (tmax / 10),
    tmin = (tmin / 10),
    snow = round(snow * .03937),
    snwd = round(snwd * .03937)
  )
  
```


looking at the general trends of snowfall of at least 2 inches over the years. 
```{r}
noaa_df %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  filter(snow > 2) %>% 
plot_ly(y = ~snow, color = ~year, type = "box" )
```
